synopsis.text: Haruki Nakano, an average high school student, finds himself in an extraordinary living situation with his four sisters in a shared apartment complex. As the only male sibling, he must navigate the chaos and eccentricities of his family, from the eldest sister Mutsuki's threats to cut allowances, to the mischievous twins Uzuki and Satsuki's early morning tickling escapades, and the temperamental Yayoi's penchant for hitting him. Despite the trials and tribulations of living with four sisters, Haruki cherishes the unpredictable and lively atmosphere of his unconventional home, where every day brings a new adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
